main.name: Yameen Dasadiya
main.bio: Hi there! I am Yameen! You might also know me as Dyameen. I've been coding for over 1 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I have now trained thousand's of developers across the globe. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help juniors enter the world of web development. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.

education.school: M.H.Saboo Siddik College Of Engineering, (Mumbai University)

work.title: Jr Python Developer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world!

testimonials.text: Yameen is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Yameen has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
